summary: Kha'thok The Old Khajiiit, standalone follower.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Kha'thok[/size] it's a standalone khajiit and marriable.

I intend to improve it and make it a better follower. However, not immediately.

You can found it in Riverwood, Sleeping Giant Inn.

Spells he know: ward spells, bound sword.

[size=4][b][center]:Story:[/center]

[/b][size=2]Kha'thok is an old Khajiit who is after the search for his son. Rumors say he was seen in High Hrothgar, asking about the dragons.
His personality is gentle, so he will not hesitate to help anyone, even in the most crazy moments.[/size][/size]

[size=3][b][center]:How you can marry:[/center][/b][/size]

You need to meet the vainilla conditions: talk to Maramal (Riften) and the get the Mara's Amulet.
[size=3]
[b][center]:Notes:[/center][/b][/size]

I'm from Spain, so maybe on english version don't work.

Tested with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]UFO[/url] (If you have [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]AFT[/url] and work, please, tell me)
[center]
[size=3][b]:Future ideas and updates:[/b][/size][/center]
[list]
[*][size=2]Make Kha'thok's son, Ma'hul.[/size]
[*][size=2]Ma'hul i'll be marriable as well[/size]
[*][size=2]Make quest for Kha'thok.[/size]
[/list]
[i][color=#cc0000][size=3]IMPORTANT:[color=#ffffff] I am learning to use creation kit according to what I need. So I will need time and support (with ideas, what you think, and so on).[/color][/size][/color][/i]
[center][size=4][b]:[u]Mods used and Suggested[/u]:[/b][/size][/center][size=4][b]

[color=#00ffff][size=2][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url][/size][/color][/b][color=#00ffff][size=2]
[/size][/color][b][color=#00ffff][size=2][color=#00ffff][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D25846&pUp=1]TERA Armors Collection by asianboy345[/url][/color][/size][/color][/b][color=#00ffff][size=2][color=#00ffff] [color=#ffffff][b]used for screenshots (Go here if you want to wear him cool)[/b][/color]
[/color][/size][/color][/size][size=4][b][color=#00ffff][size=2][color=#00ffff][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot[/url]
[color=#ffffff][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5941/?]CoverKhajiits by mrLenski[/url] (Recommend for better textures, but you can use whatever you want)

[size=3]Please, endorse these wonderful mods.[/size][/color][/color][/size][/color][/b][/size]
author: TammyOnline
